contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of April, 2000, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, and the case is remanded to the court of common pleas for a determination of whether petitioner’s waiver of appellate counsel is knowing, intelligent, and voluntary. See Commonwealth v. Kenney, 557 Pa. 195, 732 A.2d 1161, 1163 n. 5 (1999); Commonwealth v. Grazier, 552 Pa. 9, 713 A.2d 81 (1998).
